channel.title: Uninstall on MyThinkPond
channel.description: Recent content in Uninstall on MyThinkPond

item.title: Uninstall python eggs that you installed using setup.py
item.description: In Python, most libraries are available using the pip install process. But for cases, where you are distributing code to be installed in customer sites where you may or may not have a internet connection to the pip libraries, you resort to the legacy setup.py process. When you install using the setup.py process, the setup.py copies it’s collection of python files to the site-packages folder for your python virtual-environment. On a CentOS, this might be a location under (/usr/lib/python2.
